text: Within a user plot recipe, can I add entries to the legend that don't correspond to plotted data? If so, how?

elements.text: Within a user plot recipe, can I add entries to the legend that don't correspond to plotted data? If so, how?

text: Only if you add an empty series

elements.text: Only if you add an empty series

text: Unfortunately that increments the color cycle. Setting primary to false fixes that but explicitly removes the entry from the legend.

elements.text: Unfortunately that increments the color cycle. Setting primary to false fixes that but explicitly removes the entry from the legend.
